page.title: 07LODGEVALE
page.content: LODGEVALE IS THE ONLY NEW HOUSING ESTATE IN OUR AREA.THERE ARE ABOUT 150 HOUSES,THEY WERE BUILT ABOUT 15 YEARS AGO AND ARE BUNGALOWS. MOST OF THE FAMILIES ARE QUITE YOUNG AND THERE ARE LOTS OF CHIDREN. THERE IS A PLAY AREA FOR THE CHILDREN, BUT NO SHOPS.THE NEAREST SHOP IS THE CO_OP SUPERMARKET HALF A MILE AWAY. THE HOUSES ARE CHEAPER THAN OTHER HOUSES AROUND.DETACHED 3 BEDROOMED ARE ABOUT Â£20,000.A LOT OF POEPLE ARE AWAYS MOVING IN AND OUT OF LODGEVALE.THERE ARE ABOUT 10 OR 15 HOUSES FOR SALE NOW IN LODGEVALE. LODGEVALE IS A VERY TIDY PLACE.THE PEOPLE ARE VERY TIDY TOO.THEY ARE ALL NICE HOUSES IN LODGEVALE AND THE GARDENS ARE VERY NICE TOO.
